title: Nikita Kiverin
text:
Nikita Olegovich Kiverin (; born 25 March 1990) is a Russian professional <a href="Association%20football">football</a> player. He plays for <a href="FC%20Novokuznetsk">FC Novokuznetsk</a>.
Club career.
He played in the <a href="Russian%20Football%20National%20League">Russian Football National League</a> for <a href="FC%20Irtysh%20Omsk">FC Irtysh Omsk</a> in 2010.
